mapper.update: update d_safe_activity_ptc set keyid=keyid ,activityid=#{activityid} ,participant=#{participant} ,rowno=#{rowno} where keyid=#{keyid}

update d_safe_activity_ptc set keyid=keyid ,activityid=#{activityid} ,participant=#{participant} ,rowno=#{rowno} where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and activityid=#{Where_activityid} and participant=#{Where_participant} and rowno=#{Where_rowno}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.activityid "activityid", t.participant "participant", t.rowno "rowno" from d_safe_activity_ptc t where keyid=#{keyid}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.activityid "activityid", t.participant "participant", t.rowno "rowno" from d_safe_activity_ptc t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.participant=#{participant} and t.rowno=#{rowno}

select t.keyid "keyid", t.activityid "activityid", t.participant "participant", t.rowno "rowno" from d_safe_activity_ptc t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.participant=#{participant} and t.rowno=#{rowno}
mapper.delete: delete from d_safe_activity_ptc where 1=1 and keyid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and keyid =#{Where_Id} and keyid=#{Where_keyid} and activityid=#{Where_activityid} and participant=#{Where_participant} and rowno=#{Where_rowno}
mapper.select: select t.keyid "keyid", t.activityid "activityid", t.participant "participant", t.rowno "rowno" from d_safe_activity_ptc t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.participant=#{participant} and t.rowno=#{rowno}
select count(*) from d_safe_activity_ptc t where 1=1 and t.keyid=#{keyid} and t.keyid!=#{NoId} and t.activityid=#{activityid} and t.participant=#{participant} and t.rowno=#{rowno}
